text: for many people um their their
relationship with their boss or could be
anyone right but let's just say for for

that uh just hearing your boss's Voice
or even hearing the name of your boss or
just seeing your boss come walking down
the the corridor induces tension right
in our body and in our mind and we feel
my boss is stressing me out as if my

to induce stress in me from his own side

around the boss getting stressed

you are perceiving your boss
in other words the stress inducing boss

basically you have created the stress
inducing

intrinsically uh you know a stress
inducer then what could you
do but because it's a it's a reflection
of your own mind the boss then becomes
yeah like a mirror reflecting back at
you your
own
uh uh uncontrolled states of mind and
this again is where meditation is very
important because it's important that we
cultivate an experience of inner
Stillness in our heart in our heart so
that within that experience of Stillness
we can
actually think of our boss and watch
what comes up in our
mind so perhaps it'll be anger that'll
come up in our
mind or perhaps it'll you'll also
discover that associated with that is a

someone uh who can't deal with your boss
can't deal with certain situations other

incapable and the boss is is causing

the underlying states of mind that are
producing this uh rather
unhappy
relationship and once once you see that
especially on the basis of that peaceful
still mind well then you can begin to do
something about it then you can go
oh
because the the uh unattractive aspect

anger if I if I start letting go of the
anger if I breathe it out and develop a

begin to think what would be the better
response well for
example I can think about how my boss is
helping me train my mind so rather than
regarding your boss as Mr or Ms stress
you can regard your boss as your object
of improving your
patience we all need such an object in
our
life or you can think about why does
your boss act that
way they must have they must have
unhappy states of mind they must be

develop
compassion so your boss is then
transformed from someone who's just an
